title: Friendly counsaile. Or, Here's an answer to all demanders the which ile declare to all by-standers, thereby to teach them how to know a perfect friend from a flattering foe. To the tune of I could fancy pretty Nancy.
author: Records, Charles.
publisher: printed for Richard Harper in Smithfield,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date and authorship conjectured by STC.
Verse - "It was my chance not long time since,".
Woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Item at reel 1555:2 bound and filmed with several other ballads.
